Key Match Events: Dunith Wellalage got King and wickets just kept falling
Maheesh Theekshana joined the party and so did Asalanka and Hasaranga
Matheesha Pathirana also got a wicket to his name at the end

Springer looks to play the slog sweep. This time it’s a top edge and it is taken at deep mid-wicket
Pre-Game Insights: Expect the conditions in Dambulla to be nice and cool with very low chances of rain
The host’s bowling unit could do much better by delivering some key wickets in the powerplay
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka says it’s an important win for them
Rovman Powell says they did well to keep them down to 160
Pathum Nissanka, MAN OF THE MATCH, he says he had a special plan when he played the spin bowlers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The two-time T20 World Champions were in fine form as they crushed the Lankan Lions in the series opener on Sunday with a win by five wickets
For West Indies, they just couldn’t cope up with the turn and bounce the Sri Lankan batters were getting
A thumping win then for Lanka to level the series! Their spinners have spun a web around the West Indian batters
Others: The decider is to be played on the 17th of this month
